Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: tastypeppers
Reviews.Content: received 2 generic, non-Pyle-branded reverse,mirror-image only cameras (non-selectable). The product was definitely not as described and do not buy from the seller Heracles Trades - they put the Pyle name and model on the bar codes on a bag exterior to the package making it seem like a Pyle product but they are straight up dishonest and scamming. I am in the process of fulfilling the same cameras from Amazon (use the More buying choices) option on the right - costs a dollar more but totally worth not going through the hassle of disappointment and returns so hoping the right product comes this time...if i can update this later i'll do just that and let you know.Amazon gave great customer service to fix this issue so kudos to Kimberly :O) and the only reason I am giving more than a single star.

Reviews.Title: Take your chances...
Reviews.Author: HisRadness
Reviews.Content: Same as other reviews.  First I received a generic, rear view only, camera from Heracles.  It looks the same, but doesn't have the jumper wires to switch the image or remove the guide lines.  Otherwise it works.Ordered again.  This time fulfilled by Amazon.  This time I received the correct item, just as described, works great.  As long as you get what you're supposed to I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great view
Reviews.Author: Raymond J. Brunner
Reviews.Content: I had to buy this as a replacement for one my truck. The first one went bad due to my mounting and the fact that I didn't seal the wire entry. It is so nice to back up to trailers with this.

Reviews.Title: Two different cameras in 38FRV boxes
Reviews.Author: Paul "gismoman"
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these from Amazon...first one came with the jumper wires to select front/rear view (mirror image or not) and grid on- or off.  The second one externally looked the same with the same mount but it did not have the jumper wires so could only be used as a reverse camera.  Not sure if the camera was packaged in the wrong box or what, but these are supposed to be front- or rear-selectable (therein the FRV designation.)  Camera works well enough and has a decent wide angle view, but it is very hard to judge distances (proximity) to obstacles.  The question remains how well this will hold up over the long run.

Reviews.Title: Nice pick
Reviews.Author: Chase C.
Reviews.Content: I bought this little camera to mount on my boxed car trailer. Wanted it to be waterproof, did not want to spend a lot of cash, It was cheap enough in price to give it a try, and I am glad I did, It works good.I have used it on and off for a couple months, and it has held up, so I think I made the right choice.

Reviews.Title: Picture isn't great
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: Overall easy install but the picture quality isn't very good compared to the rear cam I have (Gino brand....never heard of it before but picture/color is better). I only added this brand as the front cam because the parking guide lines could be removed.....

Reviews.Title: Very Good For The Price
Reviews.Author: SKRX
Reviews.Content: This is a good little camera for the price. I routed it to a Pioneer AVIC X940BT head unit with a SPST switch tied to the reverse sensor wire. The resolution is acceptable, but certainly not spectacular. It works well in darkness. The instructions are very detailed and easy to understand. I used it for a front camera, but it can be set for rear view (mirror image) by simply twisting two wires together. You can also turn the distance lines off and on by attaching or detaching another wire. Make sure you don't get a rear-only camera if you're going to mount it in the front, or your image will be backwards. I would buy this again.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Bruce K.
Reviews.Content: Using as a backup camera on my jeep. Works great.I installed it in a piece of 3/4 dom to hold it. Welded the dom to the rear tire carrier.

Reviews.Title: Nice inexpensive camera, there are better out there, but great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Mr. Expensive Toys
Reviews.Content: Am not sure if others got their from Amazon or through one of the vendors who sell through amazon.  But mine came from Amazon and where genuine Pyle camera's with all parts, cables and manuals.For my purposes they are working great.  But to be honest am not using them as rear view cameras.  I use them mounted to front bumper and under truck as "trail" cameras for offroading.  For this purpose the cameras have been working great.  They give me a fairly clear field of view, with a slight fish eye effect.  They do fairly well in low light and shade and are very clear in the daylight.  Overall I am happy with them for the cost of the cameras.

Reviews.Title: it works but
Reviews.Author: taoshum
Reviews.Content: this "camera" works but it's not what I hoped it would be.  It's hard to know if it is the camera or the "monitor" but the combo is not very sharp and is hardly visible in the daylight...  at night it is more visible but we don't use it at night

Reviews.Title: NOT 170 degrees - 90
Reviews.Author: Dale L.
Reviews.Content: This camera has a 90 degree viewing angle.  Both the first camera received and the one which Amazon replaced it with are 90 degrees.  I called Pyle.  They insist that the camera is 170 degrees and suggested that I try PLCM18BC.  I cannot return the PLCM38FRV, because I cut a hole in my truck before testing the angle (trusting the vendor).  Replacing the truck part will cost more than leaving the camera in the hole.You be the judge.  Pyle PLCM7700 claims to have 170 degree viewing angle.  Go to Youtube and look at the 5 minute 30 second point on video watch?v=iNjEuNAKYww.  That is definitely not 170 degrees.I am surprised that Amazon sells their products.  No complaints with Amazon, just Pyle.

Reviews.Title: priced right for what it is
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Camera works good during the daytime. Its completely useless at night. Video image is o.k.  for the price I cant complain. I just wish it worked at night.

Reviews.Title: good for the money
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: got the Pyle 21 before this and was horribly disappointed.  the "manual" on pyle's site is the same for every device, but not every device has a reversible image.  tried the 38 after verifying it had a reversible image.  the wide angle is far wider than I would have imagined both horizontal and vertical. the camera is much smaller than the 21, and comes with a mounting bracket pre-installed (which the 21 did not).  Once mounted, the camera lens can be rotated without having to remove the mounting bracket.resolution is not great but its not meant to be HD.  its good enough for basic purposes like backup cams.  overall, I am satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Decent for the money
Reviews.Author: Patrick Elder
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these, one would not work the other was and still is fine, a month later.I was planning on doing a Turn Signal Cam and a Back up Cam. The 1st one I hooked up to use as a back up cam was showing a vertical picture no matter how I moved or turned it< ODD.Lucky for me the Turn Signal Cam was a worthless Idea, could not see well with it at all, So I moved that one to the back and all is well, I would buy again!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Misleading description and lack of instructions
Reviews.Author: JetRocket11 "You cannot sedate all the things...
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to mount on the front of my car. The product title and description both say that it is optional front view and rear view. Well, I opened the box and there were no instructions. I looked at the manufacturer website (Pyle Audio) and they did not have a manual for this model either. I did not even bother installing this and have returned this for a refund. It maybe a good camera and I am sure it would have worked in the rear but for the front installation you need to turn off the mirror view otherwise everything that will be displayed on the monitor will look as if its a mirror reflection which is only good for reversing. Usually there is a cable with a jumper or a loop that you cut in order to turn the mirror view on/off. This camera did not have that. There were only 2 cables attached to it - the yellow video RCA and the red one for power. Also, the image that is shown in the product description is misleading. It shows a blue and a red cable in addition to the 2 RCA ones mentioned but they were not there on the product I received. Also, I did not see an LED for night vision unless it is built into the camera lens itself. I recommend passing on this product and looking at other cameras such as a Lockpick MINICAM221

Reviews.Title: ...Quick..quite fix
Reviews.Author: slimjim
Reviews.Content: I have a great rear view, mirror monitor, also made by Pyle...I recently damaged the camera portion of the unit..If you can believe it, I was reversing when it happened...needless to say, the camera along with my bumper..Totally trashed. This was the quickest, cheapest, way to go before my wife found out...Thanks for Quick shipping and quick fix to my huge screewup!

Reviews.Title: La mejor opción.
Reviews.Author: Erick13
Reviews.Content: Es una buena opción de cámara de reversa, sencilla de instalar y viene con señalamiento de distancia marcado para la pantalla.

Reviews.Title: Pyle junk
Reviews.Author: Abraham stern
Reviews.Content: It's a pice of junk , it's garbage , i have 2 from this it's works for 10 minuts and than its deat ,,, crazy stupid camera
